content.rendered:
Introducing Ovation, a Premium Dashboard UI Kit that will help you kick start your awesome ideas. It has everything that you will need to develop any dashboard project type: CRM, Social Media, E-Commerce, Invoicing, User cards, Project management, Roadmaps, Tasks, & many more.🚀

It comes loaded with 100+ High Quality Components, 25 pre-build dashboard Web & Responsive screens, Global Styleguide incorporated.💎

Ovation Dashboard UI Kit it’s easily customizable to suit your brand. Drag, drop and mix different components to quickly build your own Dashboard in a matter of minutes.🔥

Free fonts used: Nunito Sans
Images: Pexels & Unsplash

excerpt.rendered:
Highlights

  • 100+ High-Quality Components
  • Fully Customizable & Responsive
  • 25 Exclusive Pre-Built Dashboard Screens
  • Works smoothly in Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD
  • Global Styleguide Included
  • Drag & drop library ready
